You know your kids have something special inside of them. We know it, too. Oklahoma Virtual Charter Academy (OVCA)—a public charter school authorized by the Statewide Virtual Charter School Board—and K12 make learning come alive for children just like yours. Oklahoma Virtual Charter Academy is a leader in online learning, giving you and your family choice and flexibility in your child's education. Together, we're helping Oklahoma students in grades K–12 reach their true, personal potential.
The Oklahoma Virtual Charter Academy and K12 give Oklahoma kids in grades K–12 the chance to learn in the ways that are right for them. OVCA offers:

ul.li: Full-time, tuition-free online public charter school option
In-person Start-Up Success sessions that provide an introduction to the online learning setting and a review of the expectations and policies for both an OVCA student and learning coach
Engagement and support from Oklahoma-certified teachers beginning with the enrollment process and continuing throughout the school year
An advantage for the future: students may earn college credit while in high school
Compelling, high-interest courses that introduce a variety of possible careers
A robust Gifted & Talented Program that challenges advanced learners

br.em: OVCA is a public charter school authorized by the Statewide Virtual Charter School Board.
